messages.title: Local people are backing Gordon
messages.content: Local people are backing Gordon Lindhurst to be our next MP. They want Gordon to be the strong, local voice that [...] needs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: SNP wish to destroy our country and have clearly shown their inability to run the current devolved powers they already have. To protect Edinburgh from Green Belt intrusion vote Conservative.

issues.environment: To protect Edinburgh from Green Belt intrusion vote Conservative.

housing.content: To protect Edinburgh from Green Belt intrusion vote Conservative.

endorsements.endorser: Alistair Paisley, former councillor and Juniper Green resident
endorsements.endorsement: I shall be supporting Gordon Lindhurst at the General Election, the only candidate who will protect the United Kingdom.

endorsements.endorser: Ian Duncan, Conservative MEP for Scotland and Edinburgh resident
endorsements.endorsement: Gordon will make an excellent MP for Edinburgh South West and bring valuable knowledge, experience and understanding of the issues which affect us as a nation at local, European and international level.

endorsements.endorser: George Hunter, former Craiglockhart councillor and local resident
endorsements.endorsement: I heartily endorse Gordon as candidate at the May election. He has my support to become our next MP!
